name: RadiosMysteryTheater
0:
”Alexa, Open Radios Mystery Theater.”
”Alexa, Next.”
”Alexa, Previous.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radios mystery theater
des:
Are you interested in the old-time radio show CBS Radio Mystery Theater? Rely on Radios Mystery Theater to listen to this drama like in the golden age of radio. Information source: Archive.org.

We hope you'll love Radios Mystery Theater and give us a 5-star rating. Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great Skills! If you feel that Radios Mystery Theater deserves less than a 5-star rating, please send us an email using the contact icon at Appbly.com and we'll do everything in our power to make it better.

We'd love to hear from you! If you have questions, comments, suggestions or feedback, please send us an email using the contact icon at Appbly.com.
